title: Ticket #3919: Std univ jobs without ckpt server always log error to SchedLog
description:
LIGO reports that their SchedLogs are filled with the following message: 

09/16/13 08:14:50 (pid:3558) Can't get address for checkpoint server host (NULL): Success
09/16/13 08:14:50 (pid:3558) Can't get address for checkpoint server host (NULL): Success

This is because standard universe jobs that have no checkpoint on a checkpoint server (perhaps they are short, and never needed to checkpoint), unconditionally try to remove the checkpoint from the local spool directory and the (nonexistant) checkpoint server.
remarks:
2013-Sep-16 12:51:21 by jfrey:
Code Review

I'd prefer that ​RemoveLocalOrRemoteFi​le() return 0 when server_host is NULL. 0 indicates success when actually talking to the checkpoint server.

Otherwise, this change looks good.

2013-Sep-17 14:42:19 by pfc:
Can this be applied to 8.0.3 since it's a bug fix and not a new feature?

2013-Sep-18 09:57:07 by gthain:
After discussion with wrangler and reviewer, we've agreed to cherry pick this back to 8.0, but we've missed the 8.0.3 windows, so it will go into 8.0.4.
